posts.title: Getting Started with JavaScript
posts.author: Sarah Johnson
posts.content: JavaScript is the programming language of the web. In this post, we'll cover the basics of variables, functions, and DOM manipulation. Whether you're new to programming or coming from another language, JavaScript is a great skill to learn for web development.

posts.title: CSS Flexbox Explained
posts.author: Michael Chen
posts.content: Flexbox is a powerful layout model that makes it easy to design flexible responsive layouts. In this guide, we'll walk through all the flexbox properties with practical examples you can use in your projects today.

posts.title: React Hooks Tutorial
posts.author: Emma Wilson
posts.content: React Hooks revolutionized how we write React components. Learn how to use useState, useEffect, and other hooks to simplify your components and manage state effectively in functional components.

posts.title: Node.js Backend Basics
posts.author: David Kim
posts.content: Node.js allows you to run JavaScript on the server. In this tutorial, we'll set up a basic Express server, create RESTful endpoints, and connect to a database. Perfect for full-stack JavaScript developers!

posts.title: Responsive Design Principles
posts.author: Lisa Rodriguez
posts.content: Responsive design ensures your websites look great on all devices. We'll cover media queries, fluid layouts, and responsive images to create websites that adapt to any screen size.
